regen.absent_element: driver confirmation for automatic transfer to Shunting
regen.new_specification: Automatic transfer to Shunting at or below supervised speed shall require confirmation from the driver before initiation.

regen.absent_element: Driver's confirmation for automatic transfer to Shunting.
regen.new_specification: The system shall require driver's confirmation when automatically transferring to Shunting at speeds lower than or equal to the supervised shunting speed.

regen.absent_element: explicit confirmation from the driver during automatic transfer to Shunting
regen.new_specification: The system shall require explicit confirmation from the driver to initiate automatic transfer to Shunting operation when speed conditions are met.

label: Before authomatic transition to Shunting, ETCS shall request confirmation from the driver.
absence: confirmation from the driver if authomatic transition to Shunting
